did.unittitle: Xavier University Department of Classics records
did.abstract: Materials derived from the Honors Bachelor of Arts program in the Department of Classics at Xavier University.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection includes minutes, correspondence, brochures and lists relating to the Honors Bachelor of Arts program at Xavier University.

arrangement.head: Statement of Arrangement
arrangement.p: Materials are arranged into folders by document type.

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions on Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Box Number, Folder Number, XUA-58, Xavier University Department of Classics records, Special Collections and University Archives, Xavier University Library, Cincinnati, Ohio.

accruals.head: Accruals
